name: Jiro's Sushi Chef
description:
Where a bunch of non-programmers made a game for a Game Jam and we cried but thats okay

Single level game, run around and try to collect all the ingredients with out dying or letting the time run out. OR YOU'LL BE SPOOKEd & NEVER ESCAPE. Unless you exit the window in that case you found us out ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Use's Unitys basic Asset Pack & Gothic Dania : Cemetery

Savannah : Art/Design
Max: Programming/Design
Anders: Design
Daniel : Design

ᶜᵃⁿ ᶦ ᵗᵉˡˡ ʸᵒᵘ ʰᵒʷ ᵐᵘᶜʰ ᶦ ˡᵒᵛᵉ ᵗʰᵉ ᶦᵗᵉᵐˢ ᶦ ᵈᶦᵈ ᶠᵒʳ ᵗʰᶦˢ ᵍᵃᵐᵉ ᶦ ˡᵒᵛᵉ ᵗʰᵉᵐ ˢᵒ ᵐᵘᶜʰ ᵗʰᵉʸ ᵃʳᵉ ˢᵒ ˢᵐᵃˡˡ ᵃⁿᵈ ᶜᵘᵗᵉ ᵃⁿᵈ ᶦ ˡᵒᵛᵉ ᵗʰᵉᵐ
